text: :slack: :grapes: : It looks like Slack recently started adding a notification to the favicon appearing in the browser tab. This might be useful if I had a private message or reply to a thread I'm involved with, but it seems to appear whenever there is _any_ unread message, which is just a distraction. Any idea if that can be turned off?

That notification has been there forever, but it used to be a lot more subtle (red for DMs, but the Slack logo  itself would turn white for any new message)

I don't think you can disable it without browser extensions unfortunately
